1:
--------------------
Text: California Hot Rod Reunion:  The event was created by Steve Gibbs, vice-president of the National Hot Rod Association, in October 1992, as a one-time event to gather some of the old drag racers together.

Triplets:<Steve Gibbs
2:
--------------------
Text: California Hot Rod Reunion:  It has since become an annual event in early October at Auto Club Famoso Raceway outside Bakersfield.
Triplets:<California Hot Rod Reunion
